title: Compare and Despair
itunes:title: Compare and Despair
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

When I weighed 250lbs I compared myself to others. Since losing 100lbs I have learned why I did it, why it sucked, and what part of comparing is super helpful to losing weight.

Today in my live I talk all about this habit of compare and despair. #ilost100lbs #pnptribe
